# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/_export_format.py
@source-hash: 448d3ca52ae6e6d0
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:58:57Z

## Purpose
Template definitions for exporting Rich console output to HTML and SVG formats. Provides string templates with placeholder formatting for generating styled terminal output representations.

## Key Components

### HTML Template (L1-18)
- **CONSOLE_HTML_FORMAT**: Complete HTML document template for console export
- Supports placeholder substitution for: `{stylesheet}`, `{foreground}`, `{background}`, `{code}`
- Uses monospace fonts (Menlo, DejaVu Sans Mono, Consolas, Courier New)
- Wraps content in `<pre><code>` tags to preserve formatting

### SVG Template (L20-73) 
- **CONSOLE_SVG_FORMAT**: Comprehensive SVG template for terminal visualization
- Includes embedded Fira Code font definitions (regular and bold weights) via CDN
- Supports extensive placeholder substitution including:
  - Dimensions: `{width}`, `{height}`, `{terminal_width}`, `{terminal_height}`
  - Positioning: `{terminal_x}`, `{terminal_y}`
  - Styling: `{unique_id}`, `{char_height}`, `{line_height}`, `{styles}`
  - Content: `{chrome}`, `{backgrounds}`, `{matrix}`, `{lines}`
- Uses clipping paths for terminal boundaries
- Structured with grouped elements for backgrounds and text matrix

### Constants (L75-76)
- **_SVG_FONT_FAMILY** (L75): Default font family name for SVG exports
- **_SVG_CLASSES_PREFIX** (L76): CSS class prefix for SVG styling

## Architecture Notes
- Pure template file with no executable logic
- Templates use Python string formatting with `{}` placeholders
- Double braces `{{}}` escaped for literal CSS braces
- SVG template includes comprehensive font loading fallbacks
- Designed for integration with Rich's console export functionality
